700368f-a.title: Bronx: 241st Street (East) - White Plains Road
700368f-a.text:
East 24lst Street (extreme left), south side, east from but not in-
cluding White Plains Road, to and including Furman Ave. The frame house,
in the right foreground, bears No. 464O Garden Place, adjoining the
S.E. corner of East 241st Street. Garden Place, a one block street is at
thisjdate (1937) no l9nger in existence. The frame houses in the center
facekon the east side of Furman Ave. Photographers vantage point is the
''g'' station at 241st Street and White Plains Road.
May 24, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO RDPRODUCTIONS.
